doc.title: Main Street, Fall River
doc.plot: Showing over a hundred pigeons flying from a large basket. You cannot imagine anything more realistic than a number of pigeons flying in all directions, and some directly in line with your face, and involuntarily you throw up your hands as though you feared to be hit by one or more, when they suddenly swerve either to the right or to the left and leave you to fancy them as real birds.
